examples.text: She has served as a Democratic senator for North Carolina since 2009.
the former US Senator, James Hurley
He was elected senator for Pennsylvania.
There was a visit to the area by a delegation of senior US senators.

phrases: senators on both sides of the aisle

wordOrigin: Middle English (denoting a member of the ancient Roman senate): from Old French senateur, from Latin senator, from senex ‘old man’.
